name: Prerna
body:
### welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### Python notebooks
* [Basics Notebook](https://github.com/prerna09/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)
* [Interview Notebook](https://github.com/prerna09/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-interview-notebook.ipynb)
* [Secret Notebook](https://github.com/prerna09/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-secret-notebook.ipynb)
* [Finance Notebook](https://github.com/prerna09/qfrm-python/blob/master/Finance/python-black-scholes-merton.ipynb)


### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management] (https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I completed my undergraduate work from Georgia Institute of Technology where I majored in Applied Mathematics,minored in Economics and completed a certificate in Finance. 

Previously, I have interned at TATA Asset Management Ltd. in Mumbai, India. I worked for the Product Development department and primarily focused on Bloomberg and data analytics.

My hobbies are watching movies and reading.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
